summary: Provides unit tests that verify the correctness and robustness of the SSIM (Structural Similarity Index) metric implementation, checking behavior with matching and mismatched input shapes, and with various data distributions in both 2‑D and 3‑D scenarios.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable performance of the SSIM regression metric within the MONAI framework, preventing regressions and ensuring accurate similarity measurements for medical imaging applications.
